full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MKHAN CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I GSUNG 'BUM LAS, CHOS SDE CHEN PO DGA' LDAN BKRA SHIS DGE 'PHEL GYI DGE 'DUN RNAMS KYI SPANG BLANG RNAMS TSUL BZHIN DU BGYI BA'I KHRIMS SU BCA' BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES PA'I BCA' YIG 'DI NI CHOS KHRIMS PA LEGS BSHAD RGYA MTSOS BSKUL BA'I NGOR GRVA TSANG GI LAS TSAN PA RNAMS DANG GRVA RGAN GYI BLO BSTUN PA'I GROS THOG NAS, `PAn CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG CHEN PO'I DNGOS SLOB KYI THA SHAL LHA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG MING 'CHANG BAS BGYIS PA'O,, MANGGA LAm,, DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
